description: Raise roof ridge, rear roof extension, rear roof outrigger extension incorporating Juliet balcony and installation of two roof lights to the front roof slope
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Proposed Basement, Ground and First Floor Elevations drawing no. 106 (P), Proposed Loft and Roof Plan drawing no. 107 (P), Proposed Front & Rear Elevations drawing no. 108 (P), Proposed Side 01 & Side 02 Elevations drawing no. 109 (P), Existing and Proposed Sections A-A drawing no. 110 (P), Existing and Proposed Section b-B drawing no. 111 (P).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing property

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies D1 and D2 Draft New London Plan 2018,  policies 7.4 & 7.6 of The London Plan (2016), policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), policies 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2013) and National Planning Policy Framework 2019 - Section 12 Achieving well-designed places
| No windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) and as per Condition 2 shall be formed in the walls of the extensions.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), SPG 4 - Household Extensions, policy D2 Draft New London Plan, policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019) - section 12 Achieving well-designed places.
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.
Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013.
